page.title: 06CLOTHES
page.content:
{Clothes { We all generally wear different clothes in school and out of school. Most of the girls wear skirts,jumpers dresses.They wear at home things like scruffy jeans,scruffy jumpers and old shoes.Boys usually wear in school trousers,jumpers,shoes and T.shirts. Out of school they wear old jeans, shoes and old T.shirts.My mum wears a skirt,blouse or dress and overalls. My dad at work wears overalls,a body warmer and other clothes underneath. The fashion is donkey jackets,slit skirts and jeans,hair clips stiletto shoes and jelly shoes.The fashion is long hair and long earrings.
{by Andrea Furmage,Wendy Baker, {Tracey Chillingworth.
